“ mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma koti tha්rasthawadaya lankawen thuran karayi kiyala apita loku wishwasayak thiyenawa.ee wagema api koti sanwidhanayata wiruddhawa amerikawe udghoshana wyapara diyath karanna salasum karanawa “ amerikawe padinchi shi්ra lankikayo mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma gana mahath balaporoththu pala karamin amathi dilanta kiya thibini.jathika nidahas peramunata gewi giya sathiya itha karyabahula ekak wiya.

uththara surya ge saumya hiru raus mada shitha sisiraye gilena swetha warna hima kanden da, dakshina surya ge chanda hiru rausin mademin nila warnaya wihiduwana thuru piri nil kandu pelin da, yodun ganan eka yayata wihidunu haritha warna go palana thana bim saha keth wathu walin da, dumbauru wan duhuwili pasa misa an kisidu jiwa gunayakin thora wu karkasha shushka kantharayen da, lowa an kisi bimeka daknata nolabenna wu kangaru, platipus, kwola, wombat aadi sathwa wisheshayen da, iyukaliptas, akesiya, banksiya aadi wruksha lathawen da hebi, shitha kalapiya dakshina dha්rawaya samipaye ma wage sita gharma kalapiya samakasannaya dakwa ma wage wihidenna wu me maha bhumiya, pura wasara hata dahasakatath wada wadi kalayak thisse aborijinal swadeshikayin wisin owun ge wana sarana, dadayakkara, palawala rauskarana jiwana ratawata anuwa janawasa karana laduwa pawathina.
man danna widihata ( manowidyanukulawa ) deyak danenna kiyanna hondama kramaya likhitha waharata wada kata wahara.

boho karyayan sambandhayen gathahoth lakshyayan, rekha, thala; thrikona, srujukonasra, samachathurasra wruththa saha ilipsa; rujukonasra ghana saha gola; samarupathawa saha angasamathawa athara sambandhatha; uththala, awathala, chedanaya kirima saha sparshaka rekha saha thala athara sambandhatha; rekha saha thala athara kona; rekha saha thala athara samanthara saha lambaka sambandhatha; wisthapanaya, parawarthanaya saha bhramanaya aadi samamithika swarupa; saha payithagaras prameya pilibandawa samipa danumak thibima pramanawathya.
ethuma ratath, aagamath sanwardhanaya kirimata gath prayathnaya samastha sinhala wargayata ma aadarshayaki.
